name: Imbuement of Venom
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
The touched weapon becomes imbued with poison. Its next successful attack within the duration deals an additional 1d6 poison damage. The target takes additional poison damage equal to your spellcasting stat for each AP they spend until the start of your next turn, becoming poisoned for 1 minute if it would take 10 or more poison damage in this way.

Casting this spell on a weapon ends any other spells affecting that weapon.
empower: Removes the AP cost on this spell.
